data.enText: sth you think
something that you think of or remember

data.chText: 我不喜欢你一个人步行回家。
data.enText: I don't like the thought of you walking home alone.

data.chText: 她突然想到他可能已经离去。
data.enText: She was struck by the sudden thought that he might already have left.

data.chText: 一想到这事就使我恶心。
data.enText: The very thought of it makes me feel sick.
I've just had a thought (= an idea) .

data.chText: 马克能帮忙吗？仅仅是想到这一点而已。
data.enText: Would Mark be able to help? It's just a thought .

data.chText: “你为什么不试试另一把钥匙？”“这倒是个主意！”
data.enText: ‘Why don't you try the other key?’ ‘ That's a thought !’

data.chText: 我想听听你对这个问题的看法。
data.enText: I'd like to hear your thoughts on the subject.
mind/ideas
a person's mind and all the ideas that they have in it when they are thinking
My thoughts turned to home.
process/act of thinking

data.chText: 思考能力；思维过程；思考；思维
data.enText: the power or process of thinking

data.chText: 好的教师鼓励独立思考。
data.enText: A good teacher encourages independence of thought.
She was lost in thought (= concentrating so much on her thoughts that she was not aware of her surroundings) .
the act of thinking seriously and carefully about sth

data.chText: 我对这件事认真考虑过了。
data.enText: I've given the matter careful thought.
Not enough thought has gone into this essay.
care/worry
a feeling of care or worry

data.chText: 请关心一下今冬食不果腹的人。
data.enText: Spare a thought for those without enough to eat this winter.

data.chText: 别多想了（让道了歉的人不再担心）。
data.enText: Don't give it another thought (= to tell sb not to worry after they have said they are sorry) .
It's the thought that counts (= used to say that sb has been very kind even if they have only done sth small or unimportant) .
intention
an intention or a hope of doing sth

data.chText: 她打消了所有换工作的念头。
data.enText: She had given up all thought of changing her job.

data.chText: 他这样做根本没有考虑个人得失。
data.enText: He acted with no thoughts of personal gain.
in politics/science, etc.
ideas in politics, science, etc. connected with a particular person, group or period of history
feminist thought
have second thoughts

data.chText: （经考虑后）改变想法；（转念一想）改变主意
data.enText: to change your opinion after thinking about sth again
on second thoughts
on second thought

data.chText: （表示已改变想法）又一想，转念一想
data.enText: used to say that you have changed your opinion

data.chText: 我就在这儿等。不，再一想，我还是跟你一起走。
data.enText: I'll wait here. No, on second thoughts, I'll come with you.
without a second thought
immediately; without stopping to think about sth further

data.chText: 他不假思索地随她跳入水中。
data.enText: He dived in after her without a second thought.
collect yourself/your thoughts
to try to control your emotions and become calm

data.chText: 我没事，只是需要稍稍镇定一下。
data.enText: I'm fine─I just need a minute to collect myself.
to prepare yourself mentally for sth

data.chText: 她停下来定了定神，才走进面试室。
data.enText: She paused to collect her thoughts before entering the interview room.
food for thought
an idea that makes you think seriously and carefully
a penny for your thoughts
a penny for them

data.chText: （用于询问别人想什么）你在呆呆地寻思什么呢
data.enText: used to ask sb what they are thinking about
perish the thought

data.chText: （用于拒绝一项建议或希望某事永不发生）没门儿，甭想了，下辈子吧
data.enText: used to say that you find a suggestion unacceptable or that you hope that sth will never happen
Me get married? Perish the thought!
school(s) of thought
a way of thinking that a number of people share

data.chText: 关于如何治疗这种疾病，有两派不同的意见。
data.enText: There are two schools of thought about how this illness should be treated.
a train of thought
the connected series of thoughts that are in your head at a particular time

data.chText: 电话铃声打断了我的思路。
data.enText: The phone ringing interrupted my train of thought.
the wish is father to the thought
we believe a thing because we want it to be true
have second thoughts

data.chText: （经考虑后）改变想法；（转念一想）改变主意
data.enText: to change your opinion after thinking about sth again
on second thoughts
on second thought

data.chText: （表示已改变想法）又一想，转念一想
data.enText: used to say that you have changed your opinion

data.chText: 我就在这儿等。不，再一想，我还是跟你一起走。
data.enText: I'll wait here. No, on second thoughts, I'll come with you.
without a second thought
immediately; without stopping to think about sth further

data.chText: 他不假思索地随她跳入水中。
data.enText: He dived in after her without a second thought.
collect yourself/your thoughts
to try to control your emotions and become calm

data.chText: 我没事，只是需要稍稍镇定一下。
data.enText: I'm fine─I just need a minute to collect myself.
to prepare yourself mentally for sth

data.chText: 她停下来定了定神，才走进面试室。
data.enText: She paused to collect her thoughts before entering the interview room.
food for thought
an idea that makes you think seriously and carefully
give (sb) pause
give (sb) pause for thought
to make sb think seriously about sth or hesitate before doing sth
a penny for your thoughts
a penny for them

data.chText: （用于询问别人想什么）你在呆呆地寻思什么呢
data.enText: used to ask sb what they are thinking about
perish the thought

data.chText: （用于拒绝一项建议或希望某事永不发生）没门儿，甭想了，下辈子吧
data.enText: used to say that you find a suggestion unacceptable or that you hope that sth will never happen
Me get married? Perish the thought!
school(s) of thought
a way of thinking that a number of people share

data.chText: 关于如何治疗这种疾病，有两派不同的意见。
data.enText: There are two schools of thought about how this illness should be treated.
a train of thought
the connected series of thoughts that are in your head at a particular time

data.chText: 电话铃声打断了我的思路。
data.enText: The phone ringing interrupted my train of thought.
the wish is father to the thought
we believe a thing because we want it to be true

tr: the process of using your mind to consider something carefully
the main thing you are thinking about
example: it was not a good idea
the thought never entered my mind

tr: a personal belief or judgment that is not founded on proof or certainty
example: I am not of your persuasion
what are your thoughts on Haiti?

tr: the organized beliefs of a period or group or individual

value.def: Thought is the past tense and past participle of think .
A thought is an idea that you have in your mind.

example.ex: The thought of Nick made her throat tighten...
example.tran: 一想到尼克，她的喉咙就发紧。

example.ex: I tormented myself with the thought that life was just too comfortable...
example.tran: 一想到生活太过舒适了，我内心就很痛苦。

example.ex: He pushed the thought from his mind...
example.tran: 他抛开心头这个想法。

example.ex: I've just had a thought.
example.tran: 我刚刚有了个主意。

value.def: A person's thoughts are their mind, or all the ideas in their mind when they are concentrating on one particular thing.

example.ex: I jumped to my feet so my thoughts wouldn't start to wander...
example.tran: 我跳起来，免得走神。

example.ex: Usually at this time our thoughts are on Christmas...
example.tran: 通常在这种时候，我们的心思全放在了圣诞节上。

example.ex: If he wasn't there physically, he was always in her thoughts.
example.tran: 就算他人不在那儿，他也总在她的心里。

value.def: A person's thoughts are their opinions on a particular subject.

example.ex: Many of you have written to us to express your thoughts on the conflict...
example.tran: 你们中有许多人给我们来信，表达对冲突的看法。

example.ex: Mr Goodman, do you have any thoughts on that?
example.tran: 古德曼先生，那个问题你怎么看？

value.def: Thought is the activity of thinking, especially deeply, carefully, or logically.

example.ex: Alice had been so deep in thought that she had walked past her car without even seeing it...
example.tran: 艾丽斯考虑问题入了神，连走过自己的车都没看见。

example.ex: He had given some thought to what she had told him...
example.tran: 他认真考虑了她对他说过的话。

example.ex: After much thought I decided to end my marriage.
example.tran: 经过慎重考虑，我决定结束我的婚姻。

example.ex: ...the differences between his thought processes and ours.
example.tran: 他的思维过程和我们的思维过程之间的区别

value.def: A thought is an intention, hope, or reason for doing something.

example.ex: Sarah's first thought was to run back and get Max...
example.tran: 萨拉首先想到的就是跑回去把马克斯叫来。

example.ex: They had no thought of surrender...
example.tran: 他们没有想过要投降。

example.ex: Morris has now banished all thoughts of retirement.
example.tran: 莫里斯现在已经打消了退休的所有念头。

value.def: A thought is an act of kindness or an offer of help; used especially when you are thanking someone, or expressing admiration of someone.

example.ex: 'Would you like to move into the ward?' — 'A kind thought, but no, thank you.'
example.tran: “你想不想挪到病房里来？”——“哦，您太好心了，不用了，谢谢。”

example.ex: 'She has given them this seven hundred pounds.' — 'What a lovely thought.'
example.tran: “她给了他们这 700 英镑。”——“太慷慨了。”

value.tran: 关心，善意，帮助(尤用于感谢或表达钦佩之情)

value.def: Thought is the group of ideas and beliefs which belongs, for example, to a particular religion, philosophy, science, or political party.

example.ex: Aristotle's scientific theories dominated Western thought for fifteen hundred years...
example.tran: 亚里士多德的科学理论统治了西方思想达 1,500 年。

example.ex: This school of thought argues that depression is best treated by drugs.
example.tran: 这一学派主张抑郁症最好用药物治疗。

value.tran: (宗教、哲学、科学、政党等的)思想体系，观念体系

trans: 一想到；一想到…就；一想起；一想到…；担心
学派；学派的观点；思想流派；有一家思想学校
深思；沉思；深想；陷入沉思；覃思
深思熟虑;仔细的考虑；怀疑;疑虑
思考历程；思维过程；思考過程；思考过程；思维流程
转念间，经过重新考虑后(突然改变主意)
